heading: About Us
description: Welcome to GoBooks Online, where your journey into the expansive world of accounting and bookkeeping begins. Our mission embodies dedication, innovation, and expertise. We've assembled a passionate team with a singular ambition - guiding you through a transformative learning experience to help you overcome whatever obstacles are in your way.

heading: Our Story
description: GoBooks Online is a Registered Training Organisation (RTO) with a difference. We are a team of experienced accountants and bookkeepers who have been working in the industry for many years. We have seen the changes in the industry and the need for a new generation of bookkeepers to meet the demands of the future. We have developed a range of courses to help you develop the skills you need to be a successful bookkeeper in the future.

heading: Our Mission
description: At GoBooks Online we have a dedicated team with one goal: To help you discover and develop new skill dimensions in accounting and bookkeeping with Xero, DEXT, Payroll, BAS Preparation and MYOB course options available! We also have MS Excel courses for learners wanting to develop their spreadsheet skills for accounting and bookkeeping tasks.

heading: Course Modalities
description: All courses are offered online, in the classroom or in mixed mode. Unlimited access is available to your chosen courses and materials at a time to suit you and your lifestyle and work commitments.

heading: Study at Your Pace
description: Choose from Accounting and Bookkeeping Courses at the level you want to study with the dedicated support of experienced accounts and bookkeeping trainers (during campus opening hours). All learning materials are supplied, and you have access to MYOB or Xero for 6 months to complete your course. You will need reliable access to the internet and your own laptop to compete the coursework.

heading: Levels of Study
description: Speak to us today about the opportunities for your personal and professional development. Choose from three (3) levels of study; Introduction, Intermediate or Advanced or all three (3) to learn new skills and refresh old skills for those with previous experience.

heading: Join the GoBooks Journey
description: So come with us on your journey to uncover the new bookkeeper in you and GoBooks Online, it's in our name!
